ModMetaData.name: More Archotech Implants
ModMetaData.author: LegendaryMinuteman
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a new archotech implant and three additional archotech versions of existing implants.
Cerebral Turbocharger: archotech brain implant that increases brain efficiency by 25%, reduces the need for sleep by 75%, and increases movement speed by 10%.
Vanometric Stomach: archotech version of the nuclear stomach that functions the same without the increased risk of cancer.
Archotech Joywire: archotech version of the joywire that only provides a +25 mood boost but without otherwise impacting the brain.
Archotech Skin: archotech version of the skin glands that provides +35% blunt/sharp/heat damage protection and providing a small bonus to beauty.
